name: Match Me! 3D
description:
Match Me! 3D - 2021 Best Match Puzzle Game.
Not like classic tile puzzle & mahjong games, 'Match Me! 3D' not only connects your brain to logical thinking but also is a free & fun matching puzzle game which is easy for everyone to play.
You just need to find and match identical 3D objects to make them pop among a tangled mess. When all 3D objects on the ground are collected before the time is over, you can pass the current level!
'Match Me! 3D' can help you to strengthen your memory and boost your engagement. Once you try it, this will be the only game you ever play.

HOW TO PLAY:
- The mechanics are super easy! Aim is to remove all 3D Objects.
- Easy rule to play: Only need to Drag and Match the identical 3D Objects to make them pop.
- Match all the 3D objects before the time expires to complete a level.
- Pass levels one by one to become a Champion!

FEATURES:
- Free to Play
- Shiny 3D visual effects and objects.
- Well-designed levels to power up your brain.
- Pause it whenever you want.
- Cute animals, sweet & yummy food, cool toys, exciting emojis and much more stuff to puzzle out.
- Catchy sounds and vivid 3D visual effects.
- Power ups to help you along the way.
- Global Leader Boards.
- Smooth & simple controls.
- No wifi connection required.
- Haptic feedback.
- Exercise your brain and relieve stress.
- Enjoy with your friends & family!
- Privacy Settings to keep your game Data Protected and Safe.

FEEDBACKS:
- You will feel the addiction specially when making combos by matching multiple items in a row and discover new higher items as you move along to higher levels.
- If you ever love to play drop, tiles match, color match, object match stack, connect pair, connect 3D Puzzle, fills, sort, smash, merge, mine, shooter, breaker, bubble, up, em, idle or 3d games then you will definitely love this.

TERMS of USE

Join and challenge how far you can go in 'Match Me! 3D'. 'Match Me! 3D' is the best matching brain game for adults and kids.

The more you play, more fun it becomes, and you just cannot stop playing it. If you already played games which have Color Matching, Object Matching, Connect 3D Puzzle, Connect Pair, Match3, Blocks, Numbers or any types of merge games then it is Guaranteed that you will love this title.

So, what are you waiting for? Download 'Match Me! 3D' for Free and PLAY Now!

Enjoy,
Match Me! 3D Team.
